messages.subject: Re: Unschoolers in New Mexico?
messages.msgSnippet: We have an unschooling group/tribe in Albuquerque -- about 15 families, lotsa kids in the 6 to 12 age range.  We meet weekly in a park in the north valley of
messages.messageBody:
We have an unschooling group/tribe in Albuquerque -- about 15 families,
lotsa kids in the 6 to 12 age range. We meet weekly in a park in the
north valley of Albuquerque, maybe an hour from Santa Fe.

I don't know of a Santa Fe group just for unschoolers, but I'll bet
there are some unschoolers in Santa Fe.

Here's our yahoo group addy --
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ALBuquerqueUNschoolers/

Sylvia

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschoolers in New Mexico?
messages.msgSnippet: Santa Fe ... From: diana jenner  To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tue, 24 Jun 2008 8:20 pm Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]
messages.messageBody:
Santa Fe







-----Original Message-----
From: diana jenner <hahamommy@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, 24 Jun 2008 8:20 pm
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Unschoolers in New Mexico?

























On Tue, Jun 24, 2008 at 6:14 PM, <SquishyMommyof2@...> wrote:



> My hubs has been offered a new job in New Mexico and he accepted, we

> will be moved by the end of next month.? I am just wondering if there are

> any unschoolers on the list from New Mexico?? I live in IL now and the law

> is pretty permissive here, i have read the law in New Mexico and while it

> seems pretty permissive as well i wanted to be sure there wasn't any hidden

> requirements.? We are very excited to be moving, it's a great opportunity

> for our family, we will finally have financial security and not have to live

> pay check to pay check.? O the fun things i can buy the kids now. =)

> .

>

>

>



There's a big ol' group in the Albuquerque area, including Sandra Dodd :D

Where are you going to be??

--

~diana :)

xoxoxoxo

hannahbearski.blogspot.com

messages.subject: Unschoolers in New Mexico?
messages.msgSnippet: My hubs has been offered a new job in New Mexico and he accepted, we will be moved by the end of next month.? I am just wondering if there are any unschoolers
messages.messageBody:
My hubs has been offered a new job in New Mexico and he accepted, we will be moved by the end of next month.? I am just wondering if there are any unschoolers on the list from New Mexico?? I live in IL now and the law is pretty permissive here, i have read the law in New Mexico and while it seems pretty permissive as well i wanted to be sure there wasn't any hidden requirements.? We are very excited to be moving, it's a great opportunity for our family, we will finally have financial security and not have to live pay check to pay check.? O the fun things i can buy the kids now. =)

Alyssa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
